text: Here's how to cast your Quest 2 to your TV
using your headset or the Oculus app.
You'll need to cast to either a smart TV
or a TV with a Chromecast installed.
Turn on your TV and your Quest 2.

Make sure both your TV
and Quest 2 are connected
to the same WiFi network.

Press the Oculus button on
your right-hand controller.

You'll see the home menu
under the apps window.
Click on sharing to open the window
and then click on the cast tab.
A pop-up will appear.
Select your TV device and click "Next."
Our pop-up looks a bit different here,
as we're already casting to our TV
in order to capture this video.
You'll now see your headset on your TV.
First, turn on your TV and Quest 2.

Make sure both are connected
to the same WiFi network.
Launch the Oculus app on your mobile.

In the top right corner,
tap the cast icon.

Tap the drop-down arrow
next to this phone.
If your TV appears, tap on it.

Otherwise, you'll find
it under "Other Devices."

Tap "Start" and your Quest
2 will cast to your TV.
